text: Mournument is a 2004 album by the Dutch doom metal band Deinonychus. It was recorded for the Italian record label My Kingdom Music and was recorded in Mellrichstadt, Germany. == Track listing == ;Original CD == Personnel == ;Performers * Staff Glover - bass * Marco Kehren - vocals, guitar, bass * Arkdae - keyboard * William A. Sarginson - Drums ;Production * William A. Sarginson - Drumtracks * Marco Kehren - Mixed and Mastered * Markus Stock - Mixed and Mastered == Notes == Category:2002 albums Category:Deinonychus (band) albums
title: Mournument
